author: Andrew Tatarenko
text: Several years ago our municipality passed an ordinance that required residents to change their existing water meter to a smart meter.  Recently, several residents have asked for an opt-out clause.  Does anyone charge the resident for not wanting to have a radio read meter?  Also, do you require them to have the meter outside?  Your comments are much appreciated.
title: Smart Meter Opt-Out
